<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// \\file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An automatic updater for MemorySSA that handles arbitrary insertion,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deletion, and moves.  It performs phi insertion where necessary, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// automatically updates the MemorySSA IR to be correct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// While updating loads or removing instructions is often easy enough to not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need this, updating stores should generally not be attemped outside this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// API.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Basic API usage:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the memory access you want for the instruction (this is mainly so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we know where it is, without having to duplicate the entire set of create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functions MemorySSA supports).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Call insertDef or insertUse depending on whether it&#39;s a MemoryUse or a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MemoryDef.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That&#39;s it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For moving, first, move the instruction itself using the normal SSA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction moving API, then just call moveBefore, moveAfter,or moveTo with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the right arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Insert a definition into the MemorySSA IR.  RenameUses will rename any use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// below the new def block (and any inserted phis).  RenameUses should be set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to true if the definition may cause new aliases for loads below it.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is not the case for hoisting or sinking or other forms of code &#42;movement&#42;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It &#42;is&#42; the case for straight code insertion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// store a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if (foo) &#123; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// load a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Moving the store into the if block, and calling insertDef, does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// require RenameUses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// However, changing it to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// store a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if (foo) &#123; store b &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// load a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;From&#96; block was spliced into &#96;From&#96; and &#96;To&#96;. There is a CFG edge from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;From&#96; to &#96;To&#96;. Move all accesses from &#96;From&#96; to &#96;To&#96; starting at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instruction &#96;Start&#96;. &#96;To&#96; is newly created BB, so empty of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// MemorySSA::MemoryAccesses. Edges are already updated, so successors of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;To&#96; with MPhi nodes need to update incoming block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |------|        |------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// | From |        | From |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |      |        |------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |      |           ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |      |   =&gt;      \\/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |      |        |------|  &lt;- Start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |      |        |  To  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |------|        |------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#aa7518e6d6d74227a56b36eb88cfe26e6">moveAllAfterSpliceBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;To,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Start);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;From&#96; block was merged into &#96;To&#96;. There is a CFG edge from &#96;To&#96; to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;From&#96;.&#96;To&#96; still branches to &#96;From&#96;, but all instructions were moved and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#96;From&#96; is now an empty block; &#96;From&#96; is about to be deleted. Move all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// accesses from &#96;From&#96; to &#96;To&#96; starting at instruction &#96;Start&#96;. &#96;To&#96; may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// have multiple successors, &#96;From&#96; has a single predecessor. &#96;From&#96; may have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// successors with MPhi nodes, replace their incoming block with &#96;To&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |------|        |------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |  To  |        |  To  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |------|        |      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    ||      =&gt;   |      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    \\/           |      |</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// | From |        |      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// |------|        |------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#ae11d36d6d1f06cdf18a0333eab22f381">moveAllAfterMergeBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;To,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Start);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A new empty BasicBlock (New) now branches directly to Old. Some of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Old&#39;s predecessors (Preds) are now branching to New instead of Old.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The below are utility functions. Other than creation of accesses to pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to insertDef, and removeAccess to remove accesses, you should generally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not attempt to update memoryssa yourself. It is very non-trivial to get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the edge cases right, and the above calls already operate in near-optimal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// time bounds.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Remove all MemoryAcceses in a set of BasicBlocks about to be deleted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Assumption we make here: all uses of deleted defs and phi must either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// occur in blocks about to be deleted (thus will be deleted as well), or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// they occur in phis that will simply lose an incoming value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Deleted blocks still have successor info, but their predecessor edges and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Phi nodes may already be updated. Instructions in DeadBlocks should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// deleted after this call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#aa0c15073f16693ebc44c2410986cacec">removeBlocks</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> &amp;DeadBlocks);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Clone all uses and defs from BB to NewBB given a 1:1 map of all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instructions and blocks cloned, and a map of MemoryPhi : Definition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (MemoryAccess Phi or Def).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param VMap Maps old instructions to cloned instructions and old blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        to cloned blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param MPhiMap, is created in the caller of this private method, and maps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        existing MemoryPhis to new definitions that new MemoryAccesses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        must point to. These definitions may not necessarily be MemoryPhis</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        themselves, they may be MemoryDefs. As such, the map is between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        MemoryPhis and MemoryAccesses, where the MemoryAccesses may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        MemoryPhis or MemoryDefs and not MemoryUses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param IsInClonedRegion Determines whether a basic block was cloned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        References to accesses outside the cloned region will not be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        remapped.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CloneWasSimplified If false, the clone was exact. Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        assume that the clone involved simplifications that may have:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        (1) turned a MemoryUse into an instruction that MemorySSA has no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        representation for, or (2) turned a MemoryDef into a MemoryUse or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        an instruction that MemorySSA has no representation for. No other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        cases are supported.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> cloneUsesAndDefs(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp;VMap, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a14697ded10a20f6938ae56ed208f0913">PhiToDefMap</a> &amp;MPhiMap,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CloneWasSimplified = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
